Posts.Content: Mar 14, 2008 02:29PM thinkpeace wrote: I ordered a "marsupial pouch" on-line. It is basically just a bathrobe tie with velcro ends and two pockets. After walking around the hospital with the drains pinned to my gowns, I was happy to have them more securely attached. Now, ten days post surgery, I am pinning my one remaining drain to my shirt, but use the marsupial for showering, which I think is very helpful. Good luck to you. I was extremely nervous about the surgery and wanted to be prepared, but really, I didn't need anything.
Posts.Title: Is there a "packing list" for surgery? Panchoandlefty lvtwoqlt
